nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't "title placeholder" be replaced with announcementRequest.getTitle()?
Preemptively removed deprecated constructor. Fixed. Please see f3b6c93.
Something seems a little weird with the formatting. Do you have intellij setup to use the irida style xml?

In IntelliJ, imported schema from https://irida.corefacility.ca/documentation/developer/getting-started/irida-code-format.xml, highlighted comment and method and pressed Ctrl+Alt+L keys.
Please see b7e3c83.
For this line and similar below. Change the first "This is a message" in new Announcement to "This is a message title" since that is what is being set for that argument
